options.text: <color=#AE49FF>Worm</color>: You’ve come far, traveler. Let your <color=#AE49FF>focus</color> guide you here.

These lands demand more than strength. Survive these waves by playing with <color=#AE49FF>patience</color>… and <color=#AE49FF>tactics</color>. Slow your mind, watch the rhythm of the horde, and strike only when you see their weakness.

But beware… a flying horror lurks above this village. A monster unlike anything you’ve faced. Its speed is unnatural, its strikes unforgiving.
